com.facebook.buck.rules

Class Repository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.Repository

  • public class Repository
extends Object
    Represents a single checkout of a code base. Two repositories model the same code base if their underlying ProjectFilesystems are equal.
